destructionAssignmentError.ts(6,10): error TS2809: Declaration or statement expected. This '=' follows a block of statements, so if you intended to write a destructuring assignment, you might need to wrap the whole assignment in parentheses.
destructionAssignmentError.ts(12,1): error TS2809: Declaration or statement expected. This '=' follows a block of statements, so if you intended to write a destructuring assignment, you might need to wrap the whole assignment in parentheses.


==== destructionAssignmentError.ts (2 errors) ====
    declare function fn(): { a: 1, b: 2 }
    let a: number;
    let b: number;
    
    ({ a, b } = fn());
    { a, b } = fn();
             ~
!!! error TS2809: Declaration or statement expected. This '=' follows a block of statements, so if you intended to write a destructuring assignment, you might need to wrap the whole assignment in parentheses.
    
    ({ a, b } =
    fn());
    
    { a, b }
    = fn();
    ~
!!! error TS2809: Declaration or statement expected. This '=' follows a block of statements, so if you intended to write a destructuring assignment, you might need to wrap the whole assignment in parentheses.
